options.name: Smuggler
options.description: Gain +1 Piloting, +1 Coordination, and +1 Stealth. You can hide objects on your person that are difficult to find during searches.

options.name: Evasive Maneuvers
options.description: Gain +1 Piloting. While piloting a vehicle, you can use your reaction to impose disadvantage on an attack roll targeting the vehicle.

options.name: Hidden Compartments
options.description: You can create hidden compartments in vehicles or containers that are exceedingly difficult to find. Gain +1 Stealth.

options.name: Fast Talk
options.description: Gain +1 Presence and the ability to quickly come up with believable lies. You have advantage on deception checks when dealing with officials or authorities.

options.name: Action : Hasty Escape
options.description: You can perform a complex series of maneuvers to lose pursuers. Make a Piloting or Coordination check to disappear from sight for 1d4 rounds.

options.name: Reaction : False Information
options.description: When questioned about your activities or cargo, you can provide misleading information that seems truthful. Make a Presence check to convince the questioner.

options.name: Black Market Connections
options.description: You have contacts in the criminal underworld. You can find rare or illegal items at 75% of their normal cost and sell items without questions asked.

options.name: Action : Smuggler's Route
options.description: You can find hidden or alternative paths that others wouldn't notice. This allows you to bypass security, avoid dangerous areas, or find shortcuts.

options.name: Improvised Escape
options.description: Gain +1 Coordination. You can use nearby objects to create distractions or obstacles as a bonus action, giving yourself advantage on escape attempts.

options.name: Master Smuggler
options.description: Gain +1 Piloting, +1 Stealth, and +1 Presence. You can automatically succeed on one Piloting, Stealth, or Deception check per day. Your vehicle's speed increases by 25%.
